3.0.name: wordpress/ahn-feedsyndicate-news-content-plugin
3.0.description:
The FeedSyndicate WordPress Plugin is a tool that will permit you to import packaged news content from your FeedSyndicate account and insert it directly into your WordPress site.

Requires an active account from FeedSyndicate.com. Don't have one yet? No worries, we've created several special packages just for WordPress users. It includes full text news and weather at a highly discounted rates just for WordPress users.

*** The Following Discount Packages are available for WordPress Users ***

** Complete News Package - $99.99/mo This all-in-one package includes Breaking News, Sports, Entertainment and Celebrity in one affordable money saving package. Includes news articles in full text format with images.

  • SIGN UP: http://www.feedsyndicate.com/servicequote/31363732443238365231393538

  • Breaking News Package - $49.99/mo The most
